3.1.5 - Usage of computer or internet in main activity during the day

  • Data
  • Metadata

Belgium [persons]

Information about indicator

Name of the indicator 3.1.5 Usage of computer or internet in main activity during the day
Measure unit persons
Description of the indicator The data shows activities during the day during which people use a computer or internet in specific countries (Austria, France, Belgium, Norway, Hungary)
Data sources Harmonised European Time Use Survey
